type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.gradle.GradleBuild
type.description:
Provides information about the structure of a Gradle build.
@since 1.8

method.name: getRootProject
method.description:
Returns the root project for this build.

returns:The root project

method.name: getBuildIdentifier
method.description:
Returns the identifier for this Gradle build.
@since 2.13

method.name: getProjects
method.description:
Returns the set of all projects for this build. Will include the root project and any ancestors.

returns:The set of all projects.

property.name: buildIdentifier
property.description:
Returns the identifier for this Gradle build.
@since 2.13

property.name: rootProject
property.description:
Returns the root project for this build.

returns:The root project

property.name: projects
property.description:
Returns the set of all projects for this build. Will include the root project and any ancestors.

returns:The set of all projects.
